name: Giant Walrus
book: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.Hold Breath: The walrus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

actions.Multiattack: The walrus makes two attacks: one with its body flop and one with its tusks.
actions.Body Flop: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d4 + 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
actions.Tusks: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d4 + 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) piercing damage.
